tool_description:
Cocktail recipes with high-quality images stored on AWS S3 for fast accessibility. Easy to use!
Category: Coctails, Food
name: The Cocktail DB
title: The Cocktail DB

api_list.name: List of Cocktails
api_list.description: This endpoint responds with a list of cocktails that includes their names and images, as well as their IDs, which must be provided in the "Detailed Cocktail Recipe by ID" endpoint to receive the detailed cocktail recipe.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-cocktail-db3.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-cocktail-db3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Detailed Cocktail Recipe by ID

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-cocktail-db3.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-cocktail-db3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
